about_the_game:
Guardian Tactics: Deck of the Chosen is a single-player roguelike deck-building card game that takes place in a world filled with adorable Guardians, fearsome enemies, and a dire dilemma - the end of the world!

Become The Chosen and build your deck, plan your attack, and bring the fight to an invading force of enemy Androids in deep, strategic gameplay where every single move can be the difference between victory and defeat.

Learn each Guardian’s unique strengths and weaknesses, leverage them in battle, and hone your skills through playthroughs that bring new and unique challenges in order to become a true deck-building master.

Key Features:



Easy to learn deck-building gameplay and difficult to master roguelike elements turn the genre on its ear with seriously deep tactical options. Observe, stay alert, and position your Guardians to set up the best defense possible.


Discover and acquire new cards as you defeat your enemies and use them to strengthen your deck and expand your options during battle. Be strategic and add new modifiers to your existing moves or stack your deck with more power to stream-roll the android invaders!


Careful planning has its advantages. Amplify the power of your moves and attacks by utilizing each card’s unique modifier to increase Its power even more! But, these modifiers only become effective if you play them at the right time, so plan ahead and make every one of your turns as effective as possible.


Achieve victory, unlock Achievements, and get NOVA, which can be spent to unlock even more Guardian squads to use in battle. New squads open up new ways to play and new strategies to utilize in your battle against the Androids, making each battle fresh and original.

Guardian Tactics: Deck of the Chosen Demo includes:

- 3 guardians, each with different ability and skill cards
- 15+ Action Cards
